*Ability to customize [[GNOME]], [[KDE3]], [[KDE4]], [[XFCE4]], [[LXDE]], [[IceWM]], [[WindowMaker]], [[Fluxbox]], [[TWM]], and Enlightenment<ref>http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Enlightenment_(window_manager)</ref> [[Desktop Environment]] / [[X_window_manager]] via a Chrooted [[Xephyr]] window introduced in version 2.9

*Ability to customize [[GNOME]], [[KDE3]], [[KDE4]], [[XFCE4]], [[LXDE]], [[IceWM]], [[WindowMaker]], [[Fluxbox]], [[TWM]], and Enlightenment<ref>http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Enlightenment_(window_manager)</ref> [[Desktop Environment]] / [[X window manager]] via a Chrooted [[Xephyr]] window introduced in version 2.9
